NAME: C.A. Gaurav Kalani
ABOUT:
Chartered Accountant working with the Bajaj Group of Companies since past 15 years.
Started career with Bajaj Auto and after 5 years of immense learning and opportunities, moved to Bajaj Finserv post demerger of the company for taking care of Strategic Planning and Business Development initiatives of the financial services group in addition to various other initiatives including managing Windmills operations, setting up of SEZ amongst other initiatives. Post 3 years of experience into Strategy, moved to Bajaj Finance, the lending arm of the group to head the Management Reporting function including Budgeting and Planning and management MIS reporting for 2 years before moving into Mortgages as National Product Head for Home Loans and Loan Against Property businesses. Moved back to finance function as Head Finance to manage Management Reporting and Controllership units before  moving into Bajaj Housing Finance as CFO effective April 2018. Possess more than 11 years BFSI experience.
